import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-scroll"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import { useSearchParams } from "react-router-dom"; const PortfolioDetails = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); let [searchParams, setSearchParams] = useSearchParams(); const queryParameters = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search) console.log(queryParameters.get, '=====>queryParameters') const id= queryParameters.get("id"); const [portfolio, setPortfolio] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const getPortfolio = async () => { const response = await axios.get(`http://localhost:8080/user/project/:${id}`); let res = response.data.project; console.log(res) setPortfolio(res); }; getPortfolio(); }, []); return ( <> {/* */}
